meanings.definition: To cover or coat with plaster again.
meanings.sent1: She replasters the wall to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: He replasters the ceiling to fix the cracks.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy cat replasters the floor with its muddy paws.
meanings.sent4: The artist replasters the canvas of his masterpiece with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: After the storm, she replasters the house to protect it from leaks.

meanings.definition: To repair or restore with plaster.
meanings.sent1: The handyman replasters the old wall to make it look new.
meanings.sent2: They replasters the historic building to preserve its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog replasters the garden with dirt from its digging.
meanings.sent4: Time replasters memories in our minds, smoothing out the rough edges.
meanings.sent5: The skilled artisan replasters the statue with intricate details.

meanings.definition: The act of applying plaster again.
meanings.sent1: The replasters on the walls give the house a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: He learned the art of replasters from his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain caused the replasters to fall off the roof.
meanings.sent4: The cycle of replasters in old buildings is a never-ending task.
meanings.sent5: The smoothness of the replasters on the sculpture amazed the viewers.
